trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Elk Grove
There were no other sightings in Elk Grove on or around November 12th 2007
Summary: Large silent angular silent "arrow-head" shaped craft with 3 rows of yellow lights in low clouds
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 10:30-45 on mon. evening nov. 12th in elk gove on calvine road and hwy 99, i was leaving a friends house. i was in a slightly highten and agitated state as i was about to having an important discussion with my friend. it was fairly dark on his street and i could see lights from a near by shopping center lighting up the horizon. it had been a fairly cloudy day and now the clouds were fog-like and light and stars could be seen here and there through them. i was talking to my friend in his car while standing in the driveway on the frontside of home that faces south and it seemed to be just like any other night with traffic sounds from the nearby hwy 99 and calvine rd. i took a break from talking a turned around to breath heavily and just looked up in the sky to the southwest about 2-3 miles away and notice a huey army helicopter (which seems fairly normal for this area except for the time)flying aray from me towards the southwest and a search light or lights going up from the ground. it appearred to me to be light-pollution reflecting on the low level clouds. when i looked in a southwestern direction towards the freeway and consumnes jr. college, i could see a typical huey army helicopter flying around just at cloud level and a seach light in the clouds coming up from the ground about 2-4 miles away. i then saw a dim siloetted black\gray arrow-head shaped object moving behind some thin low level weak clouds. it appeared that there was a large arrow-head black\gray object moving against the black sky background that caught my attention. i then notice a very large (747 sized) silent triangular "arrow-head" shaped craft with 3 rows of fairly large yellow lights or windows dotted around it in an arrow-head pattern flying through and among the low level clouds in a semi-circular pattern and then disappeared\vanished in the sky. the craft moved in from the southwest sky and was heading east, but turned and was pointed north towards the city of sacramento, california when it came through the clouds with the lights on it from below, and then turned towards the west and disappeared. it appeared as if the craft was circling and had turned to a new heading and left. there was no "plane" noise or sound except for the helicopter sound. i was stunned and turned to tell my friend who was talking in the car but it was gone before he could see it. it almost seemed like a surreal projection of an object as it was so silent, but seemed to still move through weak cloud cover. there did not appear to be any engine noise or lights from the rear of the craft but it looked like there could have been some kind of distortion formed by the cloud in the back of the arrow-head, as if the clouds were swirling around the rear. there were many lights on the craft it appears to have about 50-100 rectangular\square lights equally spaced appart without any pulse or glowing. at least through the clouds it looked like a plane with bright windows but as it broke the clouds they looked more like large yellow rectangular surface lights. i never reported or have seen a ufo. i am not sure what it was but i know it was no plane. i felt like i was watching a movie and could not believe what i had just seen or if i had just seen it.
